caption.center: THE STATE OF WASHINGTON, Respondent, v. BRIAN LEE YOST, Appellant.

court.center: The Court of Appeals of Washington, Division Two.

posture.unpublished: [EDITOR'S NOTE: This case is unpublished as indicated by the issuing court.] Appeal from a judgment of the Superior Court for Cowlitz County, No. 92-1-00138-9, Don L. McCulloch, J., entered August 31, 1992.

opinion_text.unpublished: Affirmed by unpublished opinion per Petrie, J. Pro Tem., concurred in by Morgan, C.J., and Alexander, J.
